nodes.documentation:
@title Media Manager contract using Proof of Existence to validate ownership.
This contract uses zeppelin's Ownable and Pausable imports to manage owner capabilities
and pause the sensitive functionalities of the contract when necessary.

  * The information stored using this contract is put into a EternalStorage variable
to allow upgradeability of the contract while preserving state data following
zeppelinos guidelines about EternalStorage.
nodes.name: MediaManager

nodes.name: lastMediaIndex

addOwnedMedia(string,bool,string,string).details: Registers an IPFS file hash and its extra data to  the contract's storage.

params.isVideo: determines if the hash stored corresponds to a video uploaded to IPFS.
params.mediaHash: the IPFS file hash to register.
params.tags: list of tags relevant to the uploaded media.
params.title: a title to give to the upload media for screening purposes.

addOwnedMedia(string,bool,string,string).return: the index of the newly added media file.

checkIfExists(string).details: Shortcut utility function to check wether a media file hash has been inserted in the storage using the IPFS media file hash to check for existence.

params.mediaHash: the IPFS file hash to verify.

checkIfExists(string).return: boolean indicating if media file exists.

deleteOwnedMedia(string).details: Deletes an IPFS file hash and its extra data of the contract's storage.

params.mediaHash: the IPFS file hash to delete.

deleteOwnedMedia(string).return: boolean value indicating that the delete operation was successsful.

getMedia(uint256).details: Returns all the information stored about the media file in the corresponding index sent as parameter.

params.mediaIndex: - index of registered media file in the storage.

getMedia(uint256).return: the media file is a video (isVideo).associated title of the media file (title).associated tags of the media file (tags).the timestamp when media file was saved in the blockchain.the media file hash obtained fro IPFS.the address of the owner of this media file.

getMediaByMediaHash(string).details: Shortcut utility function to get all the information of a given media file by using its media hash to obtain the data.

params.mediaFileHash: the IPFS media file hash saved.

getMediaByMediaHash(string).return: the media file is a video (isVideo).associated title of the media file (title).associated tags of the media file.the timestamp when media file was saved in the blockchain.the media file hash obtained fro IPFS.the address of the owner of this media file.

getMediaIndexByHash(string).details: Shortcut utility function to read a media file's index by its hash.

params.mediaHash: the IPFS media file hash registered.

getMediaIndexByHash(string).return: uint media file index if exists or zero (0).

getUserMedia(uint256).details: Returns all the information stored about a media file given a media owner and  the index of the media file in user's media array.

params.userMediaIndex: - Index of saved media file in user's media array.

getUserMedia(uint256).return: the media file is a video (isVideo).associated title of the media file (title).associated tags of the media file.the timestamp when media file was saved in the blockchain.the media file hash obtained fro IPFS.the address of the owner of this media file.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

lastMediaIndex().details: Reads the last inserted media file index from storage.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

paused().return: true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

upgradeContract(address).details: Give the contract proxy to a new contract by allowing it to manipulate storage. This function execution was marked to be only possible when the contract's state machine is in paused state.  That means that access to sensitive functionality in the contract should be paused prior to call this function.

params.newAddress: the address of new contract proxy deployed.

upgradeContract(address).return: success If the transaction is processed successfully

devdoc.title: Media Manager contract using Proof of Existence to validate ownership. This contract uses zeppelin's Ownable and Pausable imports to manage owner capabilities and pause the sensitive functionalities of the contract when necessary.   * The information stored using this contract is put into a EternalStorage variable to allow upgradeability of the contract while preserving state data following zeppelinos guidelines about EternalStorage.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
